title: Donald Trump rally to be held in Virginia
text:
Donald Trump rally to be held in Virginia RICHMOND, Va. (WUSA9) -- The day after the Democratic presidential debate, Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump will be in Virginia. (WUSA9) -- The day after the Democratic presidential debate, Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump will be in Virginia.  //on.wusa9.com/1RHwecR   Join the Conversation To   Donald Trump rally to be held in Virginia WUSA 9 Staff, WUSA 9:40 a.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Republican Presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at the No Labels Problem Solver convention October 12, 2015 in Manchester, New Hampshire. Eight presidential candidates addressed the bipartisan event which included many undecided New Hampshire voters (Photo: Darren McCollester/Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
RICHMOND, Va. (WUSA9) -- The day after the Democratic presidential debate, Republican presidential hopeful Donald Trump will be in Virginia. 
His campaign is holding a rally Wednesday night at the Richmond International Raceway in Richmond. The event starts at 7 p.m. 
WUSA9 will have coverage of the event. 
Tuesday night, Trump live-tweeted the debate , slamming all of the candidates, including former Maryland governor Martin O'Malley. He stated that O'Malley had "very little chance" of becoming the Democratic front-runner.
